title: Save up on the OnePlus Nord N30 with this Deal!
description: Grab OnePlus' budget phone for a bit less. The post Save up on the OnePlus Nord N30 with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Grab OnePlus' budget phone for a bit less.
text: These days, you don’t really need a top-of-the-line premium phone for essentials such as calls and messages, web and socials, as well as the occasional selfie session. With that in mind, you might want to check out what OnePlus offers with its Nord line of phones—the OnePlus Nord N30 5G is certainly a tempting offer at the moment, with up to 10% off from its usual retail price. Sure, the N30 is an entry-level device, although it should be said that it does pack a decent set of features for the a relatively low price tag. The phone comes with a large 6.7-inch display with a smooth 120Hz refresh rate which makes it ideal for web browsing, movie streaming and games, a 108-megapixel main camera with additional sensors, a large 5,000 mAh battery with 50W fast-charging support, and Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 695 chipset. You can grab the phone using the link below. These days, you don’t really need a top-of-the-line premium phone for essentials such as calls and messages, web and socials, as well as the occasional selfie session. With that in mind, you might want to check out what OnePlus offers with its Nord line of phones—the OnePlus Nord N30 5G is certainly a tempting offer at the moment, with up to 10% off from its usual retail price.

Sure, the N30 is an entry-level device, although it should be said that it does pack a decent set of features for the a relatively low price tag. The phone comes with a large 6.7-inch display with a smooth 120Hz refresh rate which makes it ideal for web browsing, movie streaming and games, a 108-megapixel main camera with additional sensors, a large 5,000 mAh battery with 50W fast-charging support, and Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 695 chipset.
